Create a new role-based access control (RBAC) policy.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["role","resourceGroup","permission"],"properties":{"role":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the role. (or \"*\" for all roles)"},"resourceGroup":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the resource group. (or \"*\" for all resource groups)"},"permission":{"type":"string","enum":["GET","POST","PATCH","DELETE","HEAD","*"],"description":"The allowed permission (e.g., \"GET\", \"POST\", \"*\")."}},"title":"RBACPolicy"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
